coffee.title: Coffee Reading
deep.coffee.p1: Consider rim and base patterns together; repeated marks signal daily habits.
deep.coffee.p2: Micro-ritual: 3 deep breaths + 5 min journaling; one-sentence intention: I choose one small step today.
deep.coffee.title: Deepening - Beyond the Cup
deep.default: Deepening: choose one small step today and apply it.
deep.dream.p1: Notice your symbol 3 times today; log context (where, with whom, feeling).
deep.dream.p2: Short evening recap: what did it remind you of? Write a brief intention.
deep.dream.title: Symbol Journal
deep.palm.p1: Index/middle mounds relate to mental energy; try a 20-25 min single-focus block.
deep.palm.p2: Center voids invite lightening the load; close one postponed task today.
deep.palm.title: Hand Analysis Detail
deep.tarot.p1: 1) Focus: finish one task end-to-end today.
deep.tarot.p2: 2) Communication: be clear and kind in one sentence.

premium.closing: Pick one tiny action today and execute it.
premium.coffee.var0: First add one cup photo and write a clear intent; then try again.
premium.coffee.var1: Add a second image and revisit; write your intent in one sentence.
premium.coffee.var2: Add the saucer or the other cup as the third; comparison becomes clearer.
premium.coffee.var3: With three images (2 cups + saucer), compare patterns; look for common traces.
premium.dream.prompt: Look for 3 small signs for {symbol} during the day and take brief notes.
premium.palm.line1: Heart line: emotional expression; try soft communication.
premium.palm.line2: Head line: focus and plan; 20-min single-focus sprint.
premium.palm.prep: Take a sharp palm photo with good lighting.

waiting.speedup_hint: You can reduce the wait from 10 to 5 minutes by watching an ad.
daily.tip.1: Monday: first crescent; ground your intention.
daily.tip.2: Tuesday: Mars spark; take one bold step.
daily.tip.3: Wednesday: Mercury clarity; speak plainly, flow clearly.
daily.tip.4: Thursday: Jupiter breadth; learn and widen your vision.
daily.tip.5: Friday: Venus harmony; add kindness to bonds.
daily.tip.6: Saturday: Saturn discipline; set a boundary, deepen.
daily.tip.7: Sunday: Sun renewal; rest, refresh your light.
energy.generic.low: Low energy: keep the ritual gentle; short breath + one intention.
energy.generic.med: Medium energy: a 15–20 min single-focus block works well.
energy.generic.high: High energy: add a bold step; set a clear target.
energy.coffee.low: Turn the cup a second time; look with a soft intent.
energy.coffee.med: Read rim and base together; pick one sign to follow.
energy.coffee.high: Compare three images (2 cups + saucer); choose the common trace.
energy.tarot.low: Write one-sentence message of a single card.
energy.tarot.med: One question, three cards; be clear and kind.
energy.tarot.high: Move: derive a microâ€‘action from the spread.
energy.palm.low: Try soft communication for the heart line; jot it down.
energy.palm.med: 20–25 min singleâ€‘focus; plan clearly for the head line.
energy.palm.high: Close one postponed task today; lighten the load.
energy.dream.low: Notice your symbol twice; take brief notes.
energy.dream.med: Log three context notes (where, with whom, feeling).
energy.dream.high: Write a brief evening intention; turn insight into action.
energy.astro.low: Gentle ritual: 3 deep breaths + a kind intention.
energy.astro.med: Open a singleâ€‘focus block; add a short midday walk.
energy.astro.high: Set a bold goal; make a threeâ€‘sentence evening review.
ai.template.coffee:
{name}, the cup patterns are calm yet distinct. Topic: {topic}. A small, concrete step opens doors.
• {dow} focus: one topic, 10–15 min.
Note: For entertainment only.
ai.template.tarot:
{name}, the spread invites clarity. Cards: {cards}.
• Write a one-sentence intention today.
ai.template.palm:
{name}, the lines point to balance and focus.
• Try a 20–25 min single‑focus and add gentle communication.
ai.template.dream:
{name}, notice two signs of your symbol today and jot brief notes.
• Add a one‑sentence evening intention.
ai.template.astro: {name}, daily astro note for {zodiac}: rhythm, focus, and one soft step.
live.tip.0: Take 3 deep breaths and release softly.
live.tip.1: Write your topic in one clear sentence.
live.tip.2: Block a 10-minute single-focus slot; silence notifications.
live.opener.spiritual: {name}, your intention aligns with the flow of {dow}. A small, concrete step is right now.
live.opener.humorous: {name}, sip your coffee; the universe sometimes winks with humor.
live.opener.default: {name}, honestly: a small, clear step is the best start.
live.follow_up: Can you share your core question in one sentence?
live.disclaimer: Note: This chat is for entertainment; use your own judgment and consult professionals when needed.
live.astro_note: Astro note: The {elem} element supports your intuition today.
